titles.title: Joint Cyber Defense Collaborative Act
Joint Cyber Defense Collaborative Act
To amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to establish within the Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency a Joint Cyber Defense Collaborative, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Homeland Security, and in addition to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Homeland Security, and in addition to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Referred to the Subcommittee on Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Protection.
Subcommittee on Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Protection Discharged
Ordered to be Reported by the Yeas and Nays: 17 - 13.
